title: How it feels to play as Tahm

replies.body: When the champ team were  wondering how to indicate to allies that Tahm was using his ultimate I just sent them this gif, too perfect >:D

<3 hahha.

We need a fat b**tard skin for him, with a hat and kilt and everything
When I was doing concepts for Chef Kench a few of them were more of a gross greasy fry cook that may have looked a little like that guy. He's such a fun champ to work on; I can't wait to play him >:)
I don't know if it is just me, but I see Chef Kawasaki in the Chef Kench skin.[Chef Kawasaki](http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130527174957/kirby/en/images/1/1f/KSS_Chef_Kawasaki.png)
Haha I haven't seen him before but if I had he would definitely be inspiration.
Me too! I havent been so excited for a champion release ever! Its everything I could dream of in a champion!!

Except maybe he needs a knockup

http://giphy.com/gifs/troll-you-mad-face-eVy46EWyclTIA
Also, a red comment on my post, notice me senpai :)
i rather smash gl(ass) as taric but noo he has to look like sht even thou his theme should make him look fabulous and stylish lel gg rito gg

Was that why he had that tiny hat from that post yesterday about Tahm origins similar to the one on this gif?
This one

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-x2NEVuBiskU/VYxSYSf9xbI/AAAAAAAAEVY/y2U3mzqasAY/s200/image%2B%25283%2529.jpg
Haha! Probably not but the team that worked on him are doing  a Q&A on thursday - that'd be the best time to find out.
I upvoted you once for the post... Now I just wish I could upvote it again for you having such a great summoner name.
well played, Sir

Thread title is "How it feels to play as Tahm" not "How it feels to devour champions as Tahm." Bit less specific.

Im sorry man D:
I couldn't play him yet, cause I don't have PBE (Rito please) and I can't wait to try. There are so many licking jokes to make.

When I saw his devour for the first time, that is exactly what I thought of, too!
